Title: The Big Tits Dragon
Writer: Rei Mikamoto (manga series "Kyonyû doragon"), Takao Nakano (screenplay)
Actors: Sora Aoi, Risa Kasumi, Mari Sakurai, Tamayo
Plot: A medieval Book of the Dead is discovered in the catacombs that run under a small town strip club. When one of the desperate strippers raises an army of the undead, the rest of the ...
